headline: A Handy Doodle
description: Notebook totem in red, black, and olive marker: a one-eyed, grinning mask with ribbed crest and ribboned body, drawn on ruled paper with ink spatters left in. A spontaneous guardian—part face, part signal—sketched by hand without a net.
resonantThread: Totemic faces and pocket guardians—the small image that carries signal

associatedMedia.description: Photo of a bold hand-drawn totem on ruled notebook paper; high-contrast red/black/olive with an eye and wide grin.
